eLCS_ClassifierSet module¶

Name: eLCS_ClassifierSet.py Authors: Ryan Urbanowicz - Written at Dartmouth College, Hanover, NH, USA Contact: ryan.j.urbanowicz@darmouth.edu Created: November 1, 2013 Description: This module handles all classifier sets (population, match set, correct set) along with mechanisms and heuristics that act on these sets.

algorithm published by Stewart Wilson (1995).

class eLCS_ClassifierSet.ClassifierSet(a=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

addClassifierToPopulation(cl, covering)[source]¶

Adds a classifier to the set and increases the microPopSize value accordingly.

clearSets()[source]¶

Clears out references in the match and correct sets for the next learning iteration.

deleteFromCorrectSet(deleteRef)[source]¶

Delete reference to classifier in population, contained in self.corectSet.

deleteFromMatchSet(deleteRef)[source]¶

Delete reference to classifier in population, contained in self.matchSet.

deleteFromPopulation()[source]¶

Deletes one classifier in the population. The classifier that will be deleted is chosen by roulette wheel selection considering the deletion vote. Returns the macro-classifier which got decreased by one micro-classifier.

deletion(exploreIter)[source]¶

Returns the population size back to the maximum set by the user by deleting rules.

doCorrectSetSubsumption()[source]¶

Executes correct set subsumption. The correct set subsumption looks for the most general subsumer classifier in the correct set and subsumes all classifiers that are more specific than the selected one.

getFitnessSum(setList)[source]¶

Returns the sum of the fitnesses of all classifiers in the set.

getIdenticalClassifier(newCl)[source]¶

Looks for an identical classifier in the population.

getIterStampAverage()[source]¶

Returns the average of the time stamps in the correct set.

getPopFitnessSum()[source]¶

Returns the sum of the fitnesses of all classifiers in the set.

getPopTrack(accuracy, exploreIter, trackingFrequency)[source]¶

Returns a formated output string to be printed to the Learn Track output file.

insertDiscoveredClassifiers(cl1, cl2, clP1, clP2, exploreIter)[source]¶

Inserts both discovered classifiers and activates GA subsumption if turned on. Also checks for default rule (i.e. rule with completely general condition) and prevents such rules from being added to the population, as it offers no predictive value within eLCS.

makeCorrectSet(phenotype)[source]¶

Constructs a correct set out of the given match set.

makeEvalMatchSet(state)[source]¶

Constructs a match set for evaluation purposes which does not activate either covering or deletion.

makeMatchSet(state_phenotype, exploreIter)[source]¶

Constructs a match set from the population. Covering is initiated if the match set is empty or a rule with the current correct phenotype is absent.

makePop()[source]¶

Initializes the rule population

rebootPop(remakeFile)[source]¶

Remakes a previously evolved population from a saved text file.

removeMacroClassifier(ref)[source]¶

Removes the specified (macro-) classifier from the population.

runAttGeneralitySum(isEvaluationSummary)[source]¶

Determine the population-wide frequency of attribute specification, and accuracy weighted specification. Used in complete rule population evaluations.

runGA(exploreIter, state, phenotype)[source]¶

The genetic discovery mechanism in eLCS is controlled here.

runPopAveEval(exploreIter)[source]¶

Calculates some summary evaluations across the rule population including average generality.

selectClassifierRW()[source]¶

Selects parents using roulette wheel selection according to the fitness of the classifiers.

selectClassifierT()[source]¶

Selects parents using tournament selection according to the fitness of the classifiers.

setIterStamps(exploreIter)[source]¶

Sets the time stamp of all classifiers in the set to the current time. The current time is the number of exploration steps executed so far.

subsumeClassifier(cl=None, cl1P=None, cl2P=None)[source]¶

Tries to subsume a classifier in the parents. If no subsumption is possible it tries to subsume it in the current set.

subsumeClassifier2(cl)[source]¶

Tries to subsume a classifier in the correct set. If no subsumption is possible the classifier is simply added to the population considering the possibility that there exists an identical classifier.

updateSets(exploreIter)[source]¶

Updates all relevant parameters in the current match and correct sets.
